author: Geoffrey Morgan
title: After oil rout, another key petroleum product could see demand evaporate
description: Economists are concerned about falling demand for diesel as historically the fuel has been tied closely to economic activity
content:
CALGARY — As oil prices crater, economists are watching refineries across North America for data on diesel production, another key petroleum product that is expected to buckle as demand evaporates.
After U.S. crude delivery contracts for May descended into n… [+5852 chars]
